info.title: Disqus API
info.description: Welcome to the Disqus Web API. The API enables developers to communicate with Disqus data from within their own applications.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Defaults to null

parameters.name: forum
parameters.description: Looks up a forum by ID (aka short name)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Defaults to 25 - Maximum value of 100

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Defaults to asc                         Choices: asc, desc

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Defaults to null

parameters.name: related
parameters.description: Defaults to [] -  You may specify relations to include with your response. Choices: forum

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Defaults to null - Unix timestamp (or ISO datetime standard)

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Defaults to null

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Defaults to null                         Choices: domain, word, ip, user, thread_slug, email, brand_unsafe_word

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Defaults to []                         Domain Name

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Defaults to [] - Email address (defined by RFC 5322)

parameters.name: forum
parameters.description: Looks up a forum by ID (aka short name)

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: Defaults to [] - IP address in CIDR notation

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Defaults to [] - Looks up a user by ID You may look up a user by username using the username query type.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: Defaults to [] - Maximum length of 200

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Looks up a category by ID

parameters.description: Defaults to []                         You may specify relations to include with your response. Choices: forum

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Defaults to null                         Unix timestamp (or ISO datetime standard)

parameters.name: since_id
parameters.description: Defaults to null

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Defaults to null                         Choices: email, user

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Defaults to []                         Email address (defined by RFC 5322)

parameters.name: forum
parameters.description: Looks up a forum by ID (aka short name)

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Defaults to []  -  Looks up a user by ID You may look up a user by username using the username query type.
